General.Name: Vertical Aerospace Ltd
General.Description: Vertical Aerospace Ltd., an aerospace and technology company, engages in designing, manufacturing, and selling zero operating emission electric vertical takeoff and landing (eVTOL) aircraft for use in the advanced air mobility market in the United Kingdom. It involves in developing its flagship VX4, an eVTOL aircraft. Vertical Aerospace Ltd. was founded in 2016 and is headquartered in Bristol, the United Kingdom.
General.Address: Camwal Court, Bristol, United Kingdom, BS2 0UW
